actions.say:
You hand Andrew one of the TwilioQuest shirts from the boxes in the corner.

"A TwilioQuest shirt - perfect! We send these to every developer who completes our first few challenges in TwilioQuest. I'm sure we can spare one for an emergency."

While he runs to the restroom to change you make two new mugs of hot chocolate. Andrew reenters the room and his eyes light up.

"To a 2019 with fewer snack-cidents!" he says as you two clink mugs. ~fin~
